tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    timestamp DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE AssessmentData (
   assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   activity_id INT,
   score FLOAT,
   date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserFeedback(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ActivityAssessment (
  assessment_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ActivityDetails (
  activity_id INT,
  activity_name VARCHAR(50),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE assessments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(255),
    grade DECIMAL(5,2),
    time_taken INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
